sentences: Regarding non-Annex I communications, Parties considered the third compilation and synthesis of initial communications; the report of the Consultative Group of Experts (CGE); and the provision of financial and technical support.
Three decisions and one set of conclusions were adopted by the SBI and the COP on this item.
The conclusions on the provision of financial and technical support were only considered by the SBI, and are summarized in the SBI section.
enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
